CustomField.formula:
Total_Other_Charges__c+
(( (Super_Built_UpArea__c*Rate_sq_Ft__c) + Water_Electricity_Rate__c + amenities_charges__c )+ Car_Parking__c)+(( (Super_Built_UpArea__c*Rate_sq_Ft__c) + Water_Electricity_Rate__c + amenities_charges__c )+ Car_Parking__c)*GST_for_Aggrement_Value__c
CustomField.label: Grand Total Before Discount
